name: OR_LNLG_ANES_RTIMS
description: Stores the anesthesia staff responsible times.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the line record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ANES_STF_START_TIME
columns.description: The time at which the anesthesia staff member became responsible for the case with the assigned role.

columns.name: ANES_STF_END_TIME
columns.description: The time at which the anesthesia staff member ceased being responsible for the case with the assigned role.

columns.name: ANES_STF_TOTAL_TIME
columns.description: The total time, in seconds, that the anesthesia staff member was responsible for the case with the assigned role.
